Label: Study Identifier
Description: A unique identifier, either a temporary identifier supplied by users or one generated by a repository or other database. For example, it could be an identifier complying with the LSID specification.

Label: Study Title
Description: A concise phrase used to encapsulate the purpose and goal of the study.

Label: Study Description
Description: A textual description of the study, with components such as objective or goals.

Label: Study Submission Date
Description: The date on which the study is submitted to an archive.

Label: Study Public Release Date
Description: The date on which the study SHOULD be released publicly.

Label: Study File Name
Datatype: String formatted as file name or URI
Description: A field to specify the name of the Study Table file corresponding the definition of that Study. There can be only one file per cell.
